mapper.insert: insert into rent_goods (RENT_GOODS_NO, RENT_GOODS_CLASS, RENT_GOODS_NAME, RENT_GOODS_DETAIL, RENT_GOODS_IMG, RENT_GOODS_QTY, RENT_GOODS_PRICE) values (#{rentGoodsNo}, 11111, #{rentGoodsName}, #{rentGoodsDetail}, #{rentGoodsImg}, #{rentGoodsQty}, #{rentGoodsPrice})
mapper.select: select RENT_GOODS_NO rentGoodsNo , RENT_GOODS_CLASS rentGoodsClass , RENT_GOODS_NAME rentGoodsName , RENT_GOODS_DETAIL rentGoodsDetail , RENT_GOODS_IMG rentGoodsImg , RENT_GOODS_QTY rentGoodsQty , RENT_GOODS_PRICE rentGoodsPrice from rent_goods

select rent_Goods_No rentGoodsNo , rent_Goods_Class rentGoodsClass , rent_Goods_Name rentGoodsName, rent_Goods_Detail rentGoodsDetail , rent_Goods_Img rentGoodsImg , rent_Goods_Qty rentGoodsQty , rent_Goods_Price rentGoodsPrice from rent_goods where rent_Goods_No= #{no}
